term.title: isoequilibrium relationship

item.text: A relationship analogous to the isokinetic relationship but applied to equilibrium data. The equation defining the isoequilibrium temperature β is: Δ r H- β Δ r S = constant and ΔS are enthalpy and entropy of reaction, respectively.

item.alttext: Δ r H- β Δ r S = constant
